item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, November 1, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. US Space Force warns of ‘mind-boggling’ build-up of Chinese capabilities
2. UK borrowing costs hit highest level this year as gilt sell-off intensifies
3. Sick man of Europe? Germany’s bosses sound alarm on staff illness
4. Trump says he will protect women whether they ‘like it or not’
5. Budget poses new challenge for UK public finances, Moody’s warns
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, November 1, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
